column1: '''Minastan''' was the second son of King [[Minardil]] of [[Gondor]].

column3: TA}}</ref> Minastan's elder brother [[Telemnar]] had sat on their father's throne for just two years when he died with all his heirs in the [[Great Plague]].<ref>{{App
column4: Gondor}}</ref>  Minastan had also died by this time - perhaps he too met his end in the Plague - but he left behind a surviving heir, [[Tarondor (King of Gondor)
column5: Tarondor]], who became the first King of a new line.<ref>{{App
